newsitem.title: USA: Alliant to take FY97 Q4 $1.30/shr charge.
newsitem.headline: Alliant to take FY97 Q4 $1.30/shr charge.

text.p: Alliant Techsystems Inc said Tuesday as a result of an accounting change, it will record a one-time non-cash charge of $17.4 million or $1.30 per share in the company's fiscal fourth quarter ended March 31, 1997.
It said the non-cash charge represents estimated future costs related primarily to ongoing environmental monitoring and maintenance activities at the company's remediation sites.
Chief financial officer Scott Meyers said Alliant traditionally has expensed these environmental charges annually.

"Prior to the issuance of Statement of Position (SOP) 96-1, these costs were charged to operating income each year as they were incurred," Meyers said in a statement. "The SOP requires that all companies now estimate these costs and establish a reserve for them, as we are doing with this one-time charge. Actual cash payments will continue to be made in the year that costs are incurred."
Alliant, an aerospace and defense company, said it will report fourth quarter and fiscal year results in mid-May.
